name: Takes One to Know One
description:
You're a little note in a big world, but what kind of note should you be in order to make musical waves? This little puzzle game (around 2-5 minutes to finish) puts you in the shoes of a little music note, and you wander around learning about the different kinds of musical puzzle pieces. Any choice you make at the end of the game is personal, and the game doesn't force you in any particular direction, so have fun learning!

This is an entry to the PegJam 2023 game jam, and is my first attempt at making a game in Bitsy. Aside from some  forest tile assets from Adam Ledoux, this is all Bisty core and what was inside my brain, music included!

Controls/Tips:

  • Use the arrow keys to move around and interact with the world! The enter key or the space key can also advance dialogue.
  • There are sound effects and diegetic music in this game, but it's somewhat loud, so I'd keep your volume at 20% to try it out.
